description: 3 Roses is a Telugu OTT series that is returning with its second season. The streaming will begin on Dec 12th, 2025, only on AhaVideo. Season 2 of the series is expected to be packed with high entertainment and thrills, as the three girls will get entangled in a web of lies, crime, and chaos. While they navigate their personal and professional lives, the series will get a lot more drama. The sequences of the series are promising, and Eesha Rabba will return in the lead role.
title: 3 Roses Season 2 OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch This Telugu Series Online

description: NASA's fractured comet C/2025 K1 (ATLAS) dazzled stargazers on Monday night, offering a rare live view of a cosmic object breaking apart after a close encounter with the Sun. The livestream, organised by the Virtual Telescope Project, began at 10 p.m. EST on November 24 (0300 GMT on November 25) and will broadcast telescopic views of the comet's multiple large fragments from Manciano, Italy, weather permitting.
title: Comet C/2025 K1 (ATLAS) Breaks Into Three Pieces Following Close Approach to the Sun

description: Missing: Dead or Alive Season 2 is a Netflix crime docuseries featuring real investigations of missing-person cases under the Richland County Sheriff’s Department. The series uncovers dark secrets, suspenseful twists, and emotional moments, engaging viewers who love true-crime content. Now available to stream globally from November 21, 2025.
title: Missing: Dead or Alive Season 2 OTT Release on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: Spanish romantic-drama film Tell Me Softly is all set to stream on OTT platforms soon. The movie is based on Mercedes Ron's popular book Tell Me series, and is the first part of the trilogy. The film marks the start of Kamila Hamilton's journey, which further continues. It is a mixture of emotion, romance and teenage drama and is already getting all the attention from the fans who are excited to watch. The Spanish Movie Tell Me Softly will be available for streaming on Prime Video starting 12th December, 2025.
title: Tell Me Softly OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch the Spanish Rom-Com Film Online

description: James Webb may have discovered the universe’s earliest supermassive black hole in galaxy GHZ2. Observations reveal high-energy emission lines, challenging existing models of rapid black hole and galaxy growth. Upcoming JWST and ALMA studies aim to confirm AGN activity and refine our understanding of early cosmic evolution.
title: James Webb Telescope May Have Discovered Universe’s Earliest Supermassive Black Hole

description: NASA’s upcoming Roman Space Telescope is expected to measure seismic waves in over 300,000 red giant stars, far greater than early predictions. These signals will help scientists better understand exoplanet systems and the Milky Way’s ancient core. Researchers say Roman’s natural survey design enables this breakthrough even before the telescope has launched.
title: NASA’s Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope Surpassing Expectations Even Before Launch, Reveals Research

description: Airtel announced that its Xstream Fiber network has grown rapidly, recording over 50 percent year-on-year growth in home passes and surpassing 500,000 km of fibre. The company said rising connected device adoption is boosting broadband demand and highlighted the expanding Xstream ecosystem, which brings broadband, TV and OTT content together.
title: Airtel Ramps Up Xstream Fiber Rollout Amid Surge in India’s Connected Homes

description: In addition to telling a great story, Dispatch is also a very fun and engaging strategy game where you manage a team of belligerent superheroes and dispatch them to put out various fires — both metaphorical and literal — across the city. All these moving parts are assembled and paced in a near seamless eight-episode package that is, at once, one of the best games of the year and one of the best TV shows of the year.
title: Dispatch Review: AhHoc Studio's Crowd-Pleasing Superhero Story Is a Soaring Success

description: The first One UI 8.5 beta build for the Galaxy S25 series has reportedly been spotted on Samsung's test servers. The update reportedly has firmware versions S938NKSU7ZYKP, S938NOKR7ZYKP and S938NKSU7CYKP. Internal builds aren’t accessible to the public, but their presence on Samsung’s servers strongly hints that the public beta release of One UI 8.5 may be just weeks away.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Could Get One UI 8.5 Beta Soon; Update Spotted on Samsung Server: Report

description: Google is reportedly testing a new approximate location toggle in Chrome for Android. The feature may give more flexibility to users to share only an approximate location with specific websites. It was spotted in version 142.0.7444.171. This change could enhance privacy controls, letting users limit websites that can track their location.
title: Google Chrome for Android Could Soon Let You Share Your Approximate Location With Websites

description: WhatsApp now supports using two accounts on the same device, a feature introduced on Android in 2023 and now rolling out to iOS. Each account requires a separate phone number and keeps its own chats, notifications, privacy settings and backups. Users can switch accounts through Settings on iOS or More Options on Android. Troubleshooting steps include restarting the device, checking connectivity and updating the app. WhatsApp currently allows only two accounts per device, and some features are not yet available for secondary accounts, especially on iOS.
title: How to Switch Accounts on WhatsApp for iOS and Android: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: OnePlus has been teasing the specifications of its upcoming Ace series phone for a while now. Recently, the tech firm revealed the design and colourways of the OnePlus Ace 6T, hinting that it will ship in three shades, while sporting a dual rear camera unit. Now, a company executive has shared some more features of the handset. It is claimed to be the world's first phone to be powered by the soon to be launched Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chip, while packing an 8,000mAh battery. The phone will also be equipped with a Glacier Cooling System for temperature control.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Charging Speed, Cooling System, Other Specifications Confirmed Ahead of Launch

description: Sam Altman and Jony Ive have confirmed that a prototype of their upcoming AI device is ready, though they are keeping its design and purpose undisclosed. In an interview, they said the device could launch within two years. Altman described it as simple, noting that Ive spent months shaping its design language. The current prototype is the second version the pair have tested.
title: Sam Altman and Jony Ive’s AI Device Prototype Finalised, Could Launch Within Two Years

description: OnePlus 15s and Vivo X300 FE could launch soon in India, a tipster has revealed. The specifications of the rumoured handsets have also been leaked online. While the OnePlus 15s is tipped to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, the Vivo X300 FE might be equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, which is set to be launched by Qualcomm on November 26. Moreover, both smartphones could carry triple camera units on the back. Additional details about the handsets could be revealed in the coming weeks.
title: Vivo X300 FE, OnePlus 15s India Launch Tipped; Specifications, Features Leaked

description: OnePlus Watch Lite will launch in select European markets on December 17 alongside the OnePlus 15R and OnePlus Pad Go 2. Positioned as the brand’s first entry-level smartwatch, it has appeared on several regional websites with a silver casing, rotating crown and silicone strap. While full specifications remain unknown, the preview shows fitness and environmental tracking feature support. The Watch Lite will likely be exclusive to Europe at launch. More features are expected to be confirmed in the days leading up to the launch.
title: OnePlus Watch Lite Design Teased; Will Launch in Europe Alongside OnePlus 15R, OnePlus Pad 2

description: Realme Watch 5 was officially launched in international markets earlier this year with features such as a 1.97‑inch AMOLED display and support for Bluetooth calling. A microsite for the Watch 5 is now live on Flipkart in India. It is advertised to deliver up to 14 days of battery life with a single charge. The Realme Watch 5 has 108 sports modes and more than 300 watch faces.
title: Realme Watch 5 Teased to Launch in India Soon; Flipkart Availability Confirmed

description: Telegram has added three creator-focused features to its app, including Live Stories, which let users stream directly from their Story feed with real-time comments and star-based interactions. Scheduled messages now support repeat intervals, and collectible Gifts will be distributed through an auction system for fairer access. The features are rolling out to all users on Android and iOS.
title: Telegram Rolls Out Live Stories, Repeated Messages, and Other Creator-Focused Features

description: Acting My Age brings Kevin Hart back on stage with a vibrant set exploring ageing, family mishaps, and midlife surprises. The Netflix special mixes sharp jokes with relatable experiences, offering a light-hearted take on growing older. Critics gave mixed reviews, but Hart’s signature energy anchors the show.
title: Acting My Age Starring Kevin Hart Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know About This Comedy Special

description: The Golden Combi is a Japanese comedy reality show that is back with its Season 2. The show is currently streaming on Amazon Prime Video.
title: The Golden Combi Season 2 Streaming Now on Amazon Prime Video: Know Everything About This Japanese Comedy Show

description: Amazon has launched Amazon Leo, a rebranded version of Project Kuiper, along with its new Leo Ultra terminal offering up to 1Gbps download speeds. Aimed at enterprises and remote operations, the service includes multiple hardware tiers and integrates with AWS for private network links. Early partners are already testing the terminals, with a wider rollout planned after the preview phase.
title: Amazon Leo Unveils Ultra Terminal for Enterprises, Offers Gigabit Satellite Connectivity

description: Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember is a documentary film that has been directed by Tom Barbor-Might. It explores themes of mental health, reconciliation of memories, and therapy
title: Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember Now Streaming Online: Know Everything About Cast, Plot, and More

description: Huawei MatePad Edge has been launched in China, alongside the Watch Ultimate 2. The new tablet and smartwatch will go on sale in the country via the company's online store in two colourways each. The MatePad Edge sports a 14.2-inch Flexible OLED display and is powered by up to a Kirin X90A chip. It features up to 32GB of RAM and up to 2TB of storage. The tablet carries a dual-rear camera unit, housed inside a circular camera module. Meanwhile, the Watch Ultimate 2 gets a 1.5-inch LTPO 2.0 AMOLED display and a round dial.
title: Huawei MatePad Edge Launched With 12,900mAh Battery, 14.2-Inch OLED Display Alongside Huawei Watch Ultimate 2

description: Industry Season 4 is back and will be released on Jio Hotstar. Season 4 will explore more pressure in the financial world while Yasmin and Harper try to strengthen their bond while also meeting professional goals.
title: Industry Season 4 OTT Release Date Revealed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Realme has launched the GT 8 Pro and GT 8 Pro Dream Edition in India, with both versions powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and offering up to 16GB RAM and 512GB storage. The standard Realme GT 8 Pro starts at Rs. 72,999, while the Dream Edition is priced at Rs. 79,999. Online buyers can avail Rs. 5,000 bank discounts, no-cost EMI and a free Deco Set, reducing the GT 8 Pro’s effective price to Rs. 67,999. Similar offers are available offline, with EMI options across major banks.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro, GT 8 Pro Dream Edition Go on Sale in India for the First Time Today: Price, Offers, Features

description: Amazon’s Black Friday Sale 2025 is expected to begin soon, with smart TVs under Rs. 50,000 expected to be a major draw. Early listings already highlight options from Sony, Samsung, LG, Xiaomi, Acer, VW, VU, TCL and Philips. While current prices appear competitive, the final cost may drop further once Amazon announces additional bank discounts, exchange offers and coupons. These combined savings could make mid-range and premium TVs more affordable. This feature highlights early deals and what to expect before full offers go live.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025: Early Deals on Smart TVs Under Rs 50,000 from Sony, Samsung, Xiaomi and More

description: Bitcoin traded near $87,900 as the market showed signs of strengthening ahead of possible monetary easing and improving risk appetite. Altcoins posted gains, with Solana, XRP and Dogecoin advancing alongside Bitcoin’s rebound. Analysts noted better sentiment driven by expectations of a December rate cut, positive ETF flows and easing volatility. However, key resistance levels remain in focus, and traders continue to watch macroeconomic signals closely.
title: Crypto Market Eyes Break Above Key Resistance Level as Bitcoin Price Rises to $87,900

description: Google has confirmed that it is working on a new operating system (OS), dubbed Aluminium OS (ALOS), for PCs, according to a job listing posted on LinkedIn. The company is looking to hire a Senior Product Manager who will oversee the workings of a team responsible for building ALOS for PCs. The tech giant also plans to phase out ChromeOS eventually, while offering ALOS for business devices. Moreover, the upcoming ALOS will be AI-centric, combining Android and ChromeOS functionalities.
title: Google’s Job Listing Confirms AI-Powered Aluminium OS Project For PCs, Tablets

description: Oakley Meta Glasses will go on sale in India next month, the company has confirmed. Meta introduced the AI-powered smart glasses in June in partnership with Oakley, pairing the brand’s HSTN frame design with Meta’s AI features. Similar to the Ray-Ban Meta lineup, the Oakley Meta Glasses support the Meta AI voice assistant and can capture video clips at up to 3K resolution.
title: Oakley Meta Glasses to Go on Sale in India in December: Check Price, Pre-Order Details

description: Steam's Black Friday deals are now live on the platform. The sale will go on till December 1. The Black Friday event brings deep discounts on games both old and new. Some of the most popular games like Red Dead Redemption 2, Marvel's Spider-Man, Hogwarts Legacy, and EA Sports FC 26 have been heavily discounted during the sale
title: Steam Black Friday Sale Best Deals: EA Sports FC 26, Battlefield 6, Silent Hill f and More

description: Huawei has launched its Mate 80 series in China. The new lineup includes Huawei Mate 80, Mate 80 Pro, Mate 80 Pro Max, and Mate 80 RS Master Edition models. The Mate 80 RS Master Edition packs 20GB RAM.
title: Huawei Mate 80, Mate 80 Pro, Mate 80 Pro Max and Mate 80 RS Master Edition Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Huawei Mate X7 was launched in China on Tuesday. The latest book-style foldable smartphone arrives as the successor to the Mate X6, which was introduced in December 2024. The Huawei Mate X7 has an 8-inch inner display with a 2K resolution and up to 2,500 nits peak brightness. It carries three outward-facing cameras and is powered by the proprietary Kirin chipset. The handset comes with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage.
title: Huawei Mate X7 Launched With 8-inch 120Hz Inner Display and HarmonyOS 6: Price, Specifications

description: OpenAI has added a new Shopping Research tool to ChatGPT, giving users a visual, interactive way to find products. Available across all major plans, it asks clarifying questions and then curates a list based on user preferences. The feature performs well in detail-heavy categories and offers “nearly unlimited” usage during the holidays, though purchases still need to be completed outside ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Introduces Shopping Research in ChatGPT, to Compete With Google’s AI Shopping Tools

description: Anthropic has introduced Claude Opus 4.5, its new top-tier model that replaces Opus 4.1. The update brings stronger coding performance, better long-context reasoning and more efficient tool use, while using fewer tokens. It can handle multi-step workflows and longer content reliably, and Anthropic says it outperforms rivals in internal coding benchmarks. The model is available through the Claude app, API and major cloud platforms.
title: Anthropic Launches Claude Opus 4.5 With Major Upgrades in Coding and Efficiency

description: Vijay Sales has announced its Black Friday Sale in India. If you’re shopping for a new smartphone, then there are great deals on smartphones under Rs. 50,000 during the Black Friday Sale. The retailer is offering a flat Rs. 4,000 discount on ICICI Bank and SBI Credit Card full swipe transactions. There are discounts on IDFC First Bank, HDFC Bank, HSBC Bank, Bank of Baroda, and American Express Credit Cards as well.
title: Black Friday Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smartphones Under Rs. 50,000 on Vijay Sales

description: Poco Pad X1 is set to launch globally on November 26 alongside the Poco Pad M1 and Poco F8 series. The tablet is expected to feature an 11.2-inch 3.2K LCD with a 144Hz refresh rate, up to 8GB LPDDR5X RAM and 512GB UFS 4.0 storage. Leaks suggest an 8850mAh battery with 45W charging, Android 15–based HyperOS 2, 13-megapixel rear and 8-megapixel front cameras, Wi-Fi 6E and stylus support. It may debut with the Poco X1 Keyboard accessory.
title: Poco Pad X1 Design, Key Specifications Leaked Ahead of November 26 Launch

description: As we are nearing the year-end, YouTube Music has started rolling out the 2025 Recap. It shows personalised insights into the music habits of users. It highlights the total listening time for favourite artists. It also spotlights the top albums and highlights the countries of the most-played artists. This year's recap also includes an AI-powered chat feature.
title: YouTube Music's 2025 Recap Rolling Out With Musical Passport, AI Chat Features

description: Adobe introduced a Photoshop extension for Google Chrome, expanding its browser-based creative tools by enabling core edits without desktop software. Users who install the extension before December 8, 2025, receive 12 months of free Photoshop Web access. Aimed at creators and professionals needing quick, lightweight editing, the tool lets users save images from the web, open them in Photoshop Web, and apply features such as background removal, colour adjustments and social media–ready cropping. Adobe said more functions will be added over time.
title: Adobe Photoshop Chrome Extension Launched, Users Get One Year of Free Photoshop Web Access

description: Apple has laid off several workers in its sales team in a rare move. Apple management notified the affected workers over the past couple of weeks, according to people familiar with the matter. The cuts extended across the sales organization — hitting some teams especially hard — though the company didn’t tell employees how many roles were involved.
title: Apple Cuts Jobs Across Its Sales Organization in Rare Layoff

description: Apple's rumoured foldable smartphone, dubbed iPhone Fold, is expected to launch globally in September 2026, alongside the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max. While the Cupertino-based tech giant has yet to confirm the development of the handset, the estimated price has surfaced online, thanks to a market research firm. As per a report, the purported iPhone Fold could be priced higher than previously expected due to increased material and hinge costs.
title: Apple's First Foldable iPhone Said to Be Priced Higher Than Top-of-the-Line iPhone 17 Pro Max Variant

description: iQOO 15 Mini is said to be in the works. The compact device is said to launch in April next year with a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 processor. It is expected to come with a 7,000mAh battery similar to the standard iQOO 15 model. The iQOO 15 Mini is likely to feature a metal frame and an ultrasonic fingerprint scanner. Meanwhile, the vanilla iQOO 15 is scheduled to go official in India later this week.
title: iQOO 15 Mini Launch Timeline Leaked; Could Be Equipped With Same Battery as Flagship iQOO 15

description: The Huawei Mate 80 series is expected to launch in China soon, comprising the Mate 80, Mate 80 Pro, Mate 80 Pro Max and the Mate 80 RS Master Edition. Ahead of the announcement, the Mate 80 Pro Max has appeared on a benchmark listing, revealing some of its key hardware details. The handset is reportedly powered by a Kirin 9030 chipset with a peak clock speed of 2.75GHz.
title: Huawei Mate 80 Pro Max With Kirin 9030 Chipset Surfaces on Geekbench Ahead of China Launch

description: Oppo is reportedly working on new A-series models, including the Oppo A6 4G and Oppo A6x. The specifications of the latter have now surfaced via a tipster. The Oppo A6x is said to feature a 6.75-inch LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate and could be powered by a Dimensity 6500 chipset, running Android 15 out of the box. It is tipped to include a 13-megapixel dual rear camera setup, measure 8.58mm in thickness, and weigh around 212g.
title: Oppo A6x Specifications Tipped Ahead of India Launch; May Get Dimensity 6300 SoC and 6,500mAh Battery

description: The iQOO 15 is scheduled to be launched in India and the global markets soon. In the days leading up to its launch, the company has teased several details about the upcoming handset. It is confirmed to be powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The global variant of the iQOO 15 will sport a 2K resolution display with up to a 144Hz refresh rate. Here is everything we know about the upcoming iQOO 15, including its launch date, expected price in India, features, specifications, and more.
title: iQOO 15: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More
